mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER(USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, REGI_ID, REGI_DTTM, FINAL_MOD_ID, FINAL_MOD_DTTM) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, PHONE AS phone FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
